categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Dream Runner was a DP20 frigate serving the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War.

The Dream Runner was a Corellian Engineering Corporation gunship, officially designated the DP20 frigate. 120 meters in length, the Dream Runner operated as an anti-starfighter warship, armed with eight double turbolaser cannons and four concussion missile launchers for ship-to-ship combat, and six quad laser cannons for starfighter screening. Equipped with a navigation computer, sensor package and deflector shields, the Dream Runner was capable of achieving speeds of 1,000 kilometers an hour in atmosphere, and possessed a Class 2 hyperdrive for faster-than-light travel with a slower Class 16 unit as a backup. The Dream Runner had storage space for 300 metric tons of cargo aboard, and could carry eight months worth of consumables.

The Dream Runner served the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War, assigned to the Trax Sector Force. Around 0 ABY, it participated in the battle of Bissillirus alongside its sister ship, the Corellian Thunder, and the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Defector.
